ARABIC: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِيَّاكُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day We gather them all together and then say to the angels, 'Was it you whom these people were worshipping?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day He will gather all of them together, He will ask the angels: "Did they worship you?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And on the Day when He will muster them all and will ask the angels: “Are they the ones who worshipped you?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when God will rise them all together and ask the angels, "Had these people been worshipping you?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And on the day when He will raise them all, and then say to the angels, “Did they worship you?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) the Day when He will gather them all together, then He will say to the angels: "Was it you that these people used to worship"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And on the day when He will gather them all together, then will He say to the angels: Did these worship you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when He shall muster them all together, then He shall say to the angels, 'Was it you these were serving?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And on the day when He will gather them all together, He will say unto the angels: Did these worship you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On the Day when He gathers them all together, He will ask the angels, "Was it you that these people worshipped?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And on the Day whereon He gathereth them together, then He will say Unto the angels: was it ye that these were wont to worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: On the day He will muster them all together, He will say to the angels, ‘Was it you that these used to worship?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: One Day He will gather them all together, and say to the angels, "Was it you that these men used to worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) the Day when He will gather them all together, and then will say to the angels: "Was it you that these people used to worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On the Day when He gathers them all together, He will say to the angels: 'Was it you that these worshipped'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when He gathers them all together, then say to the angels, “Was it you these used to worship?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention] the Day when He will gather them all and then say to the angels, "Did these [people] used to worship you?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [34:40] And, mention, on the Day when He will gather them all together, namely, [all] the idolaters, He will say to the angels, ‘Was it these who used to worship you?’ (read a-hā’ūlā’i iyyākum, pronouncing both hamzas, or by replacing the first with a yā’ or dropping it altogether).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And on the day when He will gather them) i.e. Banu Malih and the angels (all together, He will say Unto the angels: Did these worship you) by your command?
